channel.title: Developing RSPS: Prior Knowledge Of Java?
channel.description: Many people in this community had no prior Knowledge of Java before they went into RsPs. It seems as if RsPs has taught them everything/Mostly Everything they know about Java. Do you think it is essential for an individual to have Prior Knowledge of Java before beginning to develop an RsPs? Also, When i say 'RsPs' I'm saying any server available in the Download Section. Should one have knowledge of Java before they start coding a server? Or do you think it doesn't matter? In my opinion, everything is much easier because I've learned more about Java and then continued RsPs Development. What About You?

item.title: Developing RSPS: Prior Knowledge Of Java?
item.dc:creator: @Qu11 Qu
item.description:
@Qu11 wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:9, topic:537707”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=656532.msg4393098#msg4393098 date=1388215128]
I had no idea what java was before starting RSPS. Hence why my davidscape sources were such garbage. So I don’t agree that you NEED to know java to get into RSPS, but it certainly makes it easier. Using RSPS as a reason to learn Java though sounds like a fine thing to me.
[/quote]
Yeah in all seriousness I agree with david. I had no knowledge of java before rsps and now I find myself using it to create tools beneficial to me outside of the rsps scene. I also remember when david used to release davidscape 508 sources lol[/quote]

It’s great for beginners to learn on, as a lot of it’s done for you so you can pretty much just mimic other pieces of code if you’re using someone else’s source.

If you plan on making your own completely from scratch, knowledge of Java is a definite must.

Read full topic
item.source: Developing RSPS: Prior Knowledge Of Java?

item.title: Developing RSPS: Prior Knowledge Of Java?
item.dc:creator: @x1_att_ftw_x x1 att ftw x
item.description:
@x1_att_ftw_x wrote:

It almost feels like RsPS made you into such a great coder! Imagine telling that to someone, hahaha
"So how are you so good at Coding?"
“Well… You see there was this thing called Runescape Private Servers… and… ya…”

@JavaTC wrote:

It maters, yes. Though really you can get by with maintaining a server without it, if you want to expand upon it’s content you’ll need to know what you’re reading.
